effects:
Gain access to following skills for 4 turns:
	Hazardous Shell+2 (504890)
	Hyper NulAll+2 (504900)
	Sunburst+2 (504880)
	Ultra Potion+2 (504910)
name: Synthesis

desc_short.0: Enable sunburst, hazardous shell, hyper nulall, and ultra potion for four turns
desc_short.5: Aprende Supernova, Proyectil letal, OmniAntiTodo+ y Ultrapoción durante 4 turnos
